ViewObject.Name: XxcsoAccountRtnRsrcLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT xcav.account_number ,xcav.party_name ,xcav.rsv_sale_base_code rtn_base_code ,rsrc.employee_number ,rtn.route_number ,xcav.cust_account_id ,'Y' is_rsv ,xcav.sale_base_code sale_base_code ,xcav.rsv_sale_base_code rsv_sale_base_code ,TRUNC(xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date) rsv_sale_base_act_date -- 2015-09-07 [E_本稼動_13307] Add Start ,xcav.customer_class_code customer_class_code -- 2015-09-07 [E_本稼動_13307] Add End FROM xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav ,xxcso_cust_resources_v2 rsrc ,xxcso_cust_routes_v2 rtn WHERE xcav.rsv_sale_base_code IS NOT NULL AND xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date >= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate + 1) AND xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date <= TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 1))) AND NVL(xcav.customer_class_code, '00') || '-' || NVL(xcav.customer_status, ' ') IN ('00-10', '00-20','10-10', '10-20', '10-25', '10-30', '10-40', '10-50', '12-30', '12-40', '15-99', '16-99', '17-99') AND rsrc.account_number(+) = xcav.account_number AND rtn.account_number(+) = xcav.account_number UNION SELECT xcav.account_number ,xcav.party_name ,xcav.sale_base_code rtn_base_code ,rsrc.employee_number ,rtn.route_number ,xcav.cust_account_id ,'N' is_rsv ,xcav.sale_base_code sale_base_code ,xcav.rsv_sale_base_code rsv_sale_base_code ,TRUNC(xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date) rsv_sale_base_act_date -- 2015-09-07 [E_本稼動_13307] Add Start ,xcav.customer_class_code customer_class_code -- 2015-09-07 [E_本稼動_13307] Add End FROM xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav ,xxcso_cust_resources_v2 rsrc ,xxcso_cust_routes_v2 rtn WHERE NVL(xcav.customer_class_code, '00') || '-' || NVL(xcav.customer_status, ' ') IN ('00-10', '00-20','10-10', '10-20', '10-25', '10-30', '10-40', '10-50', '12-30', '12-40', '15-99', '16-99', '17-99') AND rsrc.account_number(+) = xcav.account_number AND rtn.account_number(+) = xcav.account_number -- 2015-09-07 [E_本稼動_13307] Add Start UNION ALL SELECT hca.account_number account_number ,hp.party_name party_name ,xca.receiv_base_code rtn_base_code ,rsrc.employee_number employee_number ,'' route_number ,hca.cust_account_id cust_account_id ,'N' is_rsv ,xca.receiv_base_code sale_base_code ,'' rsv_sale_base_code ,TO_DATE('') rsv_sale_base_act_date ,hca.customer_class_code customer_class_code FROM hz_parties hp ,hz_cust_accounts hca ,xxcmm_cust_accounts xca ,xxcso_cust_resources_v2 rsrc WHERE hca.party_id = hp.party_id AND xca.customer_id = hca.cust_account_id AND ( hca.customer_class_code || '-' || hp.duns_number_c ) = '14-99' AND rsrc.account_number(+) = hca.account_number
